body.name: Zinus Kai Bamboo and Metal Platform Bed Frame with Headboard / No Box Spring Needed / Easy Assembly, Queen, Brown
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 51 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 51 mins
features: STYLE, DEPENDABILITY, VALUE – Crafted from attractive bamboo and durable steel, the Kai Platform Bed features a modern, streamlined look and high-quality design that fits your budget
MADE WITH SUSTAINABLE BAMBOO – Headboard and footboard are made from sustainable bamboo with exceptional durability and a beautiful look, so you get peace-of-mind in addition to great rest

NO BOX SPRING NEEDED – Made with a sturdy steel frame, the Kai bed is built to support any mattress without the need for a box spring; supports up to 350 lbs for twin and up to 700 lbs for other sizes
EASY ASSEMBLY – All of the parts, tools, and instructions needed for easy setup are included in one compact box that ships to your door directly
5-YEAR WARRANTY – A limited 5-year warranty is included against any manufacturer defects
body.description: The Kai Bamboo and Metal Platform Bed Frame is beautifully designed to fit your industrial or modern aesthetic. Its slatted headboard and low-profile footboard are both made from beautifully finished sustainable bamboo, while the rest of the frame is constructed with sturdy steel. With its clean-lined silhouette, this modern bed enhances your primary suite, kid’s room, or guest room with style and function. Designed for use without a box spring, you can rest your mattress directly onto the metal slats for long lasting support. All parts, tools, and instructions are neatly packed into a single box that ships right to your door for quick and simple setup. A 5-year worry-free warranty is also included. With the Kai Platform Bed, meshing your style with a dependable and affordable piece of furniture can be easier than you think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty easy to assemble. Looks great!
reviews.reviewText: We’ve purchased several bed frames from this brand and have been pleased with each one. My husband and I could easily assemble one in about 15 minutes with the tool provided. This one looks exactly as pictured and is sturdy enough for our college age kiddo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of this bed and how easy it was to put together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Guest Bed
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is cool and modern looking. It is a nice SPARE bed. The bed is easy to assemble but is a bit too lightweight and flimsy. It will do for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, but shorter than you'd expect
reviews.reviewText: Very great quality, super easy to put together, seems strong so far, and good materials. The only thing that I don't like is that is seems a little shorter than I thought from the images. The entire bed ends up being very close to the ground with the mattress on it, but not a deal breaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandson put this together in 45 minutes. It looks great. I love the wood accent. The only thing I don’t like is it sits so low. I put a 10” mattress and it was perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good bedframe, false listing
reviews.reviewText: I did like the bedframe itself, it's sturdy and while it takes a while to build, it's not overly complicated. the issue I have is that even though I bought what was listed as a brand new product on amazon, there were slight signs of wear and tear on the parts. I didn't take much note of it until I saw in the padding on the central beam, there were indents left from a previous time this had been built and had a mattress on top to create those indents, as you can see in the pictures above. Not a huge deal to me personally, but I can't tell if it was an accident on their part or just a scummy move. I'd other wise recommend this product, but watch keep this in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: This bedframe was exactly what I wanted for my guest bedroom without breaking the bank. I never want to spend so much money on something that I'll feel guilty or wasteful if I change my mind in a couple years. I have found many good quality inexpensive items this way that have lasted me longer than I thought I'd even keep the item. This is actually my 2nd bedframe by Zinus. Highly recommend giving them a chance. Reading reviews are helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Missing piece, but zero customer support from either Zinus or Amazon (edit with additional hassle)
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Zinus bed frame. It arrived within a week. Tried putting it together and it is missing one crucial piece (forgive the image background we are redoing the bedroom). The issue is that I received two versions of one piece, rather than it's paired mate.I immediately followed the information on the directions to contact Zinus support. I used email to contact them and the virtual assistant responded telling me what info to send them to receive support (which I had already provided, but fine). I followed all of their instructions and heard nothing. I called the 800 number and the virtual assistant said that because I had purchased through Amazon, Zinus could not help me and that I needed to reach out to Amazon and then their virtual assistant hung up on me. Amazon says I must contact Zinus to receive support. So you see, there is no way to get help if you have a missing piece.I am debating if I want to take the bed apart and return it., but that's a major hassle. I really would just like the missing piece because otherwise the bed seems nice. In fact, it's fairly easy to put together when they give you all the correct pieces!Really, it shouldn't be this hard to just get to one piece I need to make this bed frame functional. I have spent hours trying to get this resolved, but to no avail.edit: I returned the bed and was refunded. I shipped it following amazons instructions and UPS came and picked it up in July and was refunded a week later. It is now the end of August and I was recharged for this bed frame because it was not received at the factory. However, UPS has the record of picking it up. I cannot control what happens after I ship it back. I had to go back through various customer service communications to try to get my money back again. JUST DONT DO IT. THIS BED IS NOT WORTH IT.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent mattress, poor delivery service by Hunter Logistics
reviews.reviewText: When the mattress eventually arrived via Hunter Logistics who offered no responses and the worst tracking system the mattress has been polar opposite offering exceptional comfort beyond previous mattresses costing 10 timmes as much.
